018package org.tquadrat.foundation.ap;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
022
023import javax.annotation.processing.Messager;
024import javax.annotation.processing.ProcessingEnvironment;
025import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
026import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationValue;
027import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
028import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
029import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
030import javax.tools.Diagnostic;
031import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
032import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.Set;
035
036import org.apiguardian.api.API;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
038
039/**
040 *  The specification for a set of helpers for annotation processing.
041 *
042 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
043 *  @version $Id: APHelper.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $
044 *  @since 0.1.0
045 *
046 *  @UMLGraph.link
047 */
048@SuppressWarnings( "InterfaceNeverImplemented" )
049@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: APHelper.java 944 2021-12-21 21:56:24Z tquadrat $" )
050@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
051public interface APHelper extends Messager, ProcessingEnvironment
052{
053        /*---------*\
054    ====** Methods **==========================================================
055        \*---------*/
056    /**
057     *  <p>{@summary Returns the flag that indicates whether some debug
058     *  information should be emitted to the generated code.}</p>
059     *  <p>The value is controlled by the value of the annotation processor
060     *  option
061     *  {@value APBase#ADD_DEBUG_OUTPUT}.</p>
062     *
063     *  @return {@code true} if the debug information should be added,
064     *      {@code false} if not.
065     */
066    public boolean addDebugOutput();
067
068    /**
069     *  Retrieves the
070     *  {@link AnnotationMirror}
071     *  for the given annotation
072     *  from the given
073     *  {@link Element}
074     *  instance. Only declared annotations are considered, not the inherited
075     *  ones.
076     *
077     *  @param  element The element.
078     *  @param  annotationClass The annotation to look for.
079     *  @return An instance of
080     *      {@link Optional}
081     *      that holds the found {@code AnnotationMirror} instance.
082     *
083     *  @see Element#getAnnotationMirrors()
084     */
085    public default Optional<? extends AnnotationMirror> getAnnotationMirror( final Element element, final Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass )
086    {
087        final var annotationClassName = requireNonNullArgument( annotationClass, "annotationClass" ).getName();
088        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getAnnotationMirrors().stream()
089            .filter( m -> m.getAnnotationType().toString().equals( annotationClassName ) )
090            .findFirst();
091
092        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
093        return retValue;
094    }   //  getAnnotationMirror()
095
096    /**
097     *  Retrieves the annotation value from the given annotation mirror.
098     *
099     *  @param  annotationMirror    The annotation mirror.
100     *  @return An instance of
101     *      {@link Optional}
102     *      that holds the found annotation value.
103     */
104    public default Optional<? extends AnnotationValue> getAnnotationValue( final AnnotationMirror annotationMirror )
105    {
106        final var retValue = getAnnotationValue( annotationMirror, "value" );
107
108        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
109        return retValue;
110    }   //  getAnnotationValue()
111
112    /**
113     *  Retrieves the annotation value with the given name from the given
114     *  annotation mirror.
115     *
116     *  @param  annotationMirror    The annotation mirror.
117     *  @param  name    The name of the desired value.
118     *  @return An instance of
119     *      {@link Optional}
120     *      that holds the found annotation value.
121     */
122    public default Optional<? extends AnnotationValue> getAnnotationValue( final AnnotationMirror annotationMirror, final String name )
123    {
124        final var elementValues = getElementUtils().getElementValuesWithDefaults( annotationMirror );
125        @SuppressWarnings( "unlikely-arg-type" )
126        final var retValue = elementValues.keySet().stream()
127            .filter( k -> k.getSimpleName().toString().equals( name ) )
128            .map( elementValues::get )
129            .findAny();
130
131        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
132        return retValue;
133    }   //  getAnnotationValue()
134
135    /**
136     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves a
137     *  {@link TypeMirror}
138     *  instance from an annotation.}</p>
139     *  <p>In case an annotation defines a
140     *  {@link Class Class&lt;?&gt;}
141     *  attribute, the value for that attribute is either {@code null} or
142     *  something strange, but never an instance of {@code Class<?>}. So
143     *  we need some special code to get something useful from the
144     *  annotation.</p>
145     *  <p>This implementations assumes the default name
146     *  &quot;<code>value</code>&quot; for the attribute.</p>
147     *
148     *  @param  element The annotated element.
149     *  @param  annotationClass The type of the annotation.
150     *  @return An instance of
151     *      {@link Optional}
152     *      that holds the {@code TypeMirror}
153     *      instance.
154     *  @throws NoSuchElementException  The given element is not annotated with
155     *      an annotation of the given type.
156     */
157    public default Optional<TypeMirror> getTypeMirrorFromAnnotationValue( final Element element, final Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass )
158    {
159        final var annotationMirror = getAnnotationMirror( element, annotationClass )
160            .orElseThrow( () -> new NoSuchElementException( annotationClass.getName() ) );
161
162        final var retValue = getAnnotationValue( annotationMirror )
163            .map( annotationValue -> (TypeMirror) annotationValue.getValue() );
164
165        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
166        return retValue;
167    }   //  getTypeMirrorFromAnnotationValue()
168
169    /**
170     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves a
171     *  {@link TypeMirror}
172     *  instance from an annotation.}</p>
173     *  <p>In case an annotation defines a
174     *  {@link Class Class&lt;?&gt;}
175     *  attribute, the value for that attribute is either {@code null} or
176     *  something strange, but never an instance of {@code Class<?>}. So we
177     *  need some special code to get something useful from the annotation.</p>
178     *
179     *  @param  element The annotated element.
180     *  @param  annotationClass The type of the annotation.
181     *  @param  attributeName   The name of the attribute that holds the class.
182     *  @return An instance of
183     *      {@link Optional}
184     *      that holds the {@code TypeMirror}
185     *      instance.
186     *  @throws NoSuchElementException  The given element is not annotated with
187     *      an annotation of the given type.
188     */
189    public default Optional<TypeMirror> getTypeMirrorFromAnnotationValue( final Element element, final Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass, final String attributeName )
190    {
191        final var annotationMirror = getAnnotationMirror( element, annotationClass )
192            .orElseThrow( () -> new NoSuchElementException( annotationClass.getName() ) );
193
194        final var retValue = getAnnotationValue( annotationMirror, attributeName )
195            .map( annotationValue -> (TypeMirror) annotationValue.getValue() );
196
197        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
198        return retValue;
199    }   //  getTypeMirrorFromAnnotationValue()
200
201    /**
202     *  Checks whether the given element has the given annotation.
203     *
204     *  @note If the retention for the given annotation is not
205     *      {@link java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy#RUNTIME RUNTIME}
206     *      it could have been removed from the element in an earlier compile
207     *      run.
208     *
209     *  @param  <A> The type of the annotation.
210     *  @param  element The element to inspect.
211     *  @param  annotationType  The type of the annotation to look for.
212     *  @return {@code true} if the element is annotated with the given
213     *      annotation, {@code false} if not.
214     *
215     *  @see java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy#RUNTIME
216     */
217    public default <A extends Annotation> boolean hasAnnotation( final Element element, final Class<A> annotationType )
218    {
219        final var annotation = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getAnnotation( requireNonNullArgument( annotationType, "annotationType" ) );
220        final var retValue = annotation != null;
221
222        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
223        return retValue;
224    }   //  hasAnnotation()
225
226    /**
227     *  {@inheritDoc}
228     */
229    @Override
230    public default void printMessage( final Diagnostic.Kind kind, final CharSequence msg )
231    {
232        getMessager().printMessage( kind, msg );
233    }   //  printMessage()
234
235    /**
236     *  {@inheritDoc}
237     */
238    @Override
239    public default void printMessage( final Diagnostic.Kind kind, final CharSequence msg, final Element element )
240    {
241        getMessager().printMessage( kind, msg, element );
242    }   //  printMessage()
243
244    /**
245     *  {@inheritDoc}
246     */
247    @Override
248    public default void printMessage( final Diagnostic.Kind kind, final CharSequence msg, final Element element, final AnnotationMirror annotation )
249    {
250        getMessager().printMessage( kind, msg, element, annotation );
251    }   //  printMessage()
252
253    /**
254     *  {@inheritDoc}
255     */
256    @Override
257    public default void printMessage( final Diagnostic.Kind kind, final CharSequence msg, final Element element, final AnnotationMirror annotation, final AnnotationValue value )
258    {
259        getMessager().printMessage( kind, msg, element, annotation, value );
260    }   //  printMessage()
261
262    /**
263     *  Retrieves the interfaces are that implemented or extended by the given
264     *  type element.
265     *
266     *  @param  typeElement The type element to inspect.
267     *  @param  interfaces  The already retrieved interfaces.
268     */
269    public default void retrieveInterfaces( final TypeElement typeElement, final Set<? super TypeElement> interfaces )
270    {
271        interfaces.add( typeElement );
272
273        for( final var typeMirror : typeElement.getInterfaces() )
274        {
275            final var nextInterface = (TypeElement) getTypeUtils().asElement( typeMirror );
276            if( !interfaces.contains( nextInterface ) )
277            {
278                retrieveInterfaces( nextInterface, interfaces );
279            }
280        }
281    }   //  retrieveInterfaces()
282}
283//  class APHelper
284
285/*
286 *  End of File
287 */
